data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Since this is just a plain (SWIG) wrapper for Alan Murta's gpc
    library, it might not be a bad idea to choose a rootlevel namespace.
    However, if anyoune feels this belongs somewhere else, please let me
    know. Note that I used this library to provide clipping functions in
    Math::Geometry_2D.
